Go to the bar.dialogue:
Bar manager goes outside manager outside on a break and was found dead at the bottom of cliff 
 behind the hotel. Authorities rule his death as an accident but some of hotel management suspect foul play. 
 Search for clues in the bar that can help you solve what really happened.

order a drink.dialogue: We only have jack and coke, corona, miller light, coors light

jack and coke.dialogue: Bartender says, the person at the cigar is lounge an employee that was working the night Bar manager died

make small talk with person at bar.dialogue:
The women proceeds to tell you that she was at the bar the night when the bar manager died
 she then hands you folded paper.

open the folded paper.dialogue: The message says if you can solve this riddle, I will give you more information about what happen

solve riddle.dialogue:
For a murder case investigation, police visit a bar. There, the waiter tells that victim was here with his friend.
 They both drank. Within 10 minutes, the victim managed to drink only one glass of wine. On the other hand, his friend drank 5 drinks. 
 It was later revealed that all of those drinks were poisoned. How come did the victim's friend not die, who had 5 drinks within 10 minutes? What do you think was poisoned?

Ice cubes.dialogue:
The woman says 'Ice cubes were poisoned. Because the victim's friend drank so fast, ice cubes didn't melt before he finished the drink.
 On the other hand, the victim's ice cubes melted as he was slow while drinking.' 
 now go talk to the man by the pool table
options: Talk to man by pool table

Talk to man by pool table.dialogue:
The man says, 'We were arguing because I ordered a double jack with coke 
 but got a single and was still charged for a double. 
 After that, manager cell phone rang and he went outside'
options: go outside to scan the area for clues

continue to talk with person.dialogue: The man denies he had anything to do with death of bar manager
options: go outside to scan the area for clues

go outside to scan the area for clues.dialogue: You hear a ringing of some sort but you can't tell where it is coming from.

check the car.dialogue:
The car is locked and there is dim light coming from underneath a jacket in the passenger side. Looks 
 like its the bar manager's car and it was never towed
options: break the window to get in the vehicle
try to guess the code to keyless entry pad

break the window to get in the vehicle.dialogue: You cut yourself pretty bad. You'll need to go to hospital and try again another day to solve the murders

try to guess the code to keyless entry p.dialogue:
the combo to the car is in this message, it originated some 2,000 years ago, 
 when Celtic people in Europe celebrated the end of the harvest 
 and the start of a new year in a festival called Samhain (pronounced 'sow-win')

continue to search car.dialogue: there is a locked briefcase in backseat and it looks like it takes a 4 digit combo.

try to unlock briefcase.dialogue:
there is a locked briefcase in backseat and it looks like it takes a 4 digit combo. 
 First three digits are stuck in place you'll need to guess last digit

check trunk of the car.dialogue: nothing in the trunk but now you can hear the ringing again

the woman poisoned the managers drink.
